message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $14,000 is my initial asking price, I could be persuaded to come down to $12,500. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be careful with my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $11,500. Can you consider that?
